name: Bowling Master: Funny Champion
description:
Bowling Master: Funny Championship is one of the best arcade games. This bowling 3d shot challenge arcade game gives you a chance to be a bowling master. Many interesting and advance through fun exciting levels are waiting for you in this beautifully designed 3d nationwide bowling shot challenge. Start knocking down the pins into the pocket with perfect bowling ball throw challenge
Features:
Realistic environment with 3D effect
Multiple exciting and amazing levels
Different tasks are thrilling to play
Realistic back ground effects sound
Real bowling and more than ten pins experience
